Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, enforcing entity integrity for the primary key.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AS duplicates

Description: Checks for NULL values in the customer_id column, which should never occur as it is the primary key and must always be present.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where full_name is missing (NULL), which may indicate incomplete customer information.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where date_of_birth is missing (NULL), which may impact age calculations and customer profiling.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where gender is missing (NULL), which may affect demographic analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where address is missing (NULL), which may impact customer communication and verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where phone_number is missing (NULL), which may hinder customer contact.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where email_address is missing (NULL), which may affect digital communication with customers.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where national_id_or_passport_number is missing (NULL), which may impact customer identification and KYC processes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where occupation is missing (NULL), which may affect customer segmentation.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where customer_type is missing (NULL), which may impact customer classification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where account_numbers is missing (NULL), which may indicate incomplete linkage to accounts.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where age is missing (NULL), which may affect demographic analysis and eligibility checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_by is missing (NULL), which may hinder audit trails.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_on is missing (NULL), which may impact auditability and data lineage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_by is missing (NULL), which may hinder tracking of changes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_on is missing (NULL), which may impact auditability of updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where status is missing (NULL), which may affect customer lifecycle management.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks for records where age is negative, which is logically invalid for a customer.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND age < 0

Description: Checks for records where date_of_birth is in the future, which is invalid for a customer.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Identifies records where email_address does not match a basic email pattern, which may indicate invalid emails.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks for phone_number values that do not contain only digits, spaces, plus, hyphens, or parentheses, which may indicate invalid phone numbers.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^[0-9\-\+\(\) ]+$'

Description: Checks for duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which should be unique for each customer for identification purposes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which should be unique for each customer to avoid communication errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for records where the age does not match the calculated age from date_of_birth, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, date_of_birth))::int

Description: Checks that status values are within an expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended). Update the list as per business rules.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Checks that gender values are within an expected set (e.g., Male, Female, Other). Update as per business rules.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks for records where created_on timestamp is in the future, which is invalid for record creation.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > NOW()

Description: Checks for records where modified_on is earlier than created_on, which is logically inconsistent.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on < created_on

Description: Checks for duplicate account_numbers, which may indicate multiple customers linked to the same account. Review business rules for account sharing.
Custom_SQL: SELECT account_numbers, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NOT NULL GROUP BY account_numbers HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
